author: Simon Difford
description: I love Daiquiris and this is basically a classic Daiquiri with a few bells and whistles: orange curaçao, lime juice, almond syrup, amaretto, falernum, white crème de menthe, and absinthe. A whopping ten ingredients but it's more an OTT than a "simple is beautiful" cocktail.
name: Mai Tai (Difford's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
